page.title: 06LYMM DAM AND RUGBY CLUB
page.content: In the north-western corner of the block lies Lymm Dam & Lymm Rugby Club. Lymm Dam plays host to many angling competitions throughout the season. These are usually organised by Lymm Angling Club who own the fishing rights to this particular piece of water. Many amateur anglers are seen here reguarly during the season. Lymm Rugby Club was founded in the early sixties.Since then the club has grown rapidly and is now one of the top junior clubs in the country. In the coming season(1985/6) the club will be competing in the newly formed league system for the northern clubs. Lymm will be in Division 1 and have also qualified for the John Player Cup The club also has two squash courts with teams entered in local leagues. There are also many social functions held here during the year.
